title: IN2 Supermart — Add “Website Designed By” footer designer card

requirements.summary: Add a new “Website Designed By” card-style section inside the existing footer, premium and responsive without overpowering the brand.
acceptanceCriteria: A distinct “Website Designed By” section appears within the footer without removing or breaking existing footer sections/content.
The section is presented as a card with a soft light-grey or subtle gradient background that is visually distinct from the footer background.
Desktop/tablet layout shows a circular designer photo on the left and the text content on the right.
Mobile layout stacks content responsively (photo and text remain readable, with no overflow or cramped spacing).
Typography and spacing match the site’s existing premium, clean style (Tailwind-based), and the section does not visually dominate the footer.

file_operations.description: Insert a new “Website Designed By” section (card-style container) within the footer layout (between the existing 3-column grid and the bottom credit area), using Tailwind classes for a soft light-grey/subtle gradient background, balanced spacing, and responsive layout (row on md+, stacked on mobile).

requirements.summary: Render the exact provided English designer content inside the new footer card, including the secondary dedication line.
acceptanceCriteria: The displayed name, title, description, CTA line, and the bottom dedication line exactly match the user-provided text (English) including punctuation and capitalization.
The dedication line is visually secondary (smaller/muted) but clearly readable.

file_operations.description: Add the exact provided text content (Name “Aditya Sharma”; Title “Website Designer & Digital Creator”; full description paragraph; CTA line “Need a Website for Your Business?”; and “Designed with dedication by Aditya Sharma”) into the new footer card with appropriate typography hierarchy and muted styling for the dedication line.

requirements.summary: Add an Instagram contact button with icon and subtle hover animation linking to the provided Instagram URL.
acceptanceCriteria: The button label reads exactly “Contact Me on Instagram”.
Clicking the button navigates to https://instagram.com/aditya.sharma.30 (opens in a new tab with safe rel attributes).
An Instagram icon is visible inside the button alongside the label.
The button has a subtle hover/focus interaction (e.g., slight lift/brightness/ring) consistent with the site styling.
The button remains usable and appropriately sized on mobile.

file_operations.description: Add a “Contact Me on Instagram” button within the new designer card that links to https://instagram.com/aditya.sharma.30 using target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer"; include an Instagram icon (e.g., from the existing icon library used in this file) and Tailwind-based hover/focus animation consistent with the site’s style.

requirements.summary: Preserve the existing footer bottom credit (“Made by Aditya Sharma”) and the caffeine.ai referral link exactly as currently rendered.
acceptanceCriteria: The existing bottom section still shows the caffeine.ai referral link and the “Made by Aditya Sharma” line as currently rendered in frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.tsx.
No existing footer links (Quick Links) or store information are removed.

file_operations.description: Ensure the new designer card is added without changing/removing the existing bottom credit block, including the caffeine.ai referral link markup and the “Made by Aditya Sharma” line, and without altering existing store info, quick links, or category text.

requirements.summary: Add and display a static generated designer portrait image from frontend/public/assets/generated as a circular photo in the new footer card.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and is referenced directly by the footer (no backend image serving).
The photo is displayed as a circle (e.g., rounded-full) and does not appear stretched or distorted.
The image is appropriately sized on mobile and desktop and includes an informative alt attribute.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static designer portrait asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/designer-photo.dim_320x320.png for use in the footer designer card.

Reference and render frontend/public/assets/generated/designer-photo.dim_320x320.png in the new “Website Designed By” card as a circular portrait (e.g., rounded-full, object-cover) with responsive sizing across breakpoints and an informative alt attribute.
